column3: Thanks, however copyright header updates are either done in PRs (where changes are made), or in bulk using a [script](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/contrib/devtools/copyright_header.py) prior to releases/new years etc. \n\nIf you'd like to contribute to the project, please checkout the [good first issue list](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label
